title: Got hacked.
body:
So i sent a ticket to riot and then i got respond with more questions i answered them as well. Two days of sending email back and forth i got this email from a different rioter. Then i completed the steps that he asked me and sent him back an aswer that i have done everything. And now two days later still no response whatsoever. And i just really want my account back. So i wanted to ask why did they stop sending me email because before if i send them email i got response in 6-7 hours but now i has been almost 3 days. Or do they simply dont respond on the weekends?

Also you can see the email here:

Czarnobog

Czarnobog (Riot Games Player Support)
Nov 3, 02:33 PDT

Hey,
Please confirm for me that your pc is safe from any harmful programs by following a couple of steps:
1.Download and run the CCleaner (free-trial, because it's free). You can download it from here: https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download
2.Please install Malwarebytes Anti-Malware (free-trial, because it's free) and then scan your computer. You can download it from here: https://www.malwarebytes.org/mwb-download/ 
After this, please change the password to your email addresses and let me know as soon as you have done that so that I could proceed.
Regards,
Czarnobog
Player Support Specialist
"Imagine if I had a real weapon!":

Quick Update just got my account back in a week so if you are in the same place don`t worry just be patient.

replies.body: Im in the same boat someone hacked my account and changed everything Ive put a ticket up and still no response been over 12+ hours
I just got response from rioter on my ticket so don`t worry just be patient

We've had a lot of tickets submitted recently, so response times are a bit longer than normal. If you remain patient, I'm confident the agent assigned to your ticket will get back to you. Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok thank you so much for the reply i will wait, but does this email mean i have proven that the account is mine and will get recovered?

I'm not the agent working on your ticket, but the reply certainly doesn't look like you're being asked additional verification questions. You can ask the specialist any additional questions you have regarding your account or recovery of it, if you'd like.
Ok thank you i just asked because friend of mine got hacked too and they send him this email and a little later got email for password reset.
